create_debate.title: Create Your Own Debate Online - Free Discussion Platform | TheBatee
create_debate.meta_description: Create your own debate online for free. Start meaningful discussions on any topic. Get votes, comments, and insights from a global community. Join TheBatee now!
create_debate.subtitle: Start meaningful discussions and see what the world thinks
create_debate.intro: TheBatee is a free platform where anyone can create debates on topics that matter. Whether you're discussing technology, politics, society, or culture, our global community is ready to share their opinions and vote on your questions.
create_debate.step1_desc: Create your account in seconds. No credit card required.
create_debate.step2_desc: Pick any subject you're passionate about or curious to explore.
create_debate.step3_desc: Frame your debate as a clear yes/no question or multiple-choice poll.
create_debate.step4_desc: Watch votes come in and engage with comments from around the world.
create_debate.feature1_desc: Reach people from over 100 countries in 12 languages.
create_debate.feature2_desc: See instant results as people cast their votes.
create_debate.feature3_desc: Read diverse perspectives and join the discussion.
create_debate.feature4_desc: Share your debate on social media and get more participants.
create_debate.faq1_a: Yes! Creating debates on TheBatee is completely free and open to everyone. Simply create an account and you can start your first debate immediately.
create_debate.faq2_q: What topics can I debate about?
create_debate.faq2_a: You can debate about almost anything: technology, politics, lifestyle, entertainment, science, and more. We only ask that debates remain respectful and follow our community guidelines.
create_debate.faq3_q: How long does a debate stay active?
create_debate.faq3_a: Debates remain active indefinitely unless you choose to close them. The longer your debate is active, the more votes and comments it can receive.
create_debate.faq4_q: Can I edit my debate after publishing?
create_debate.faq4_a: Yes, you can edit your debate title and description at any time. This helps you clarify your question or add additional context.

vote_on_topics.title: Vote on Controversial Topics - Share Your Opinion | TheBatee
vote_on_topics.meta_description: Vote on controversial topics and trending debates. Share your opinion on technology, politics, society, and culture. See real-time results from thousands of voters worldwide.
vote_on_topics.subtitle: Your opinion counts. Vote on debates from around the world.
vote_on_topics.intro: Join thousands of people voting on the most interesting and controversial topics of our time. From AI ethics to climate change, from social issues to tech innovations, find debates that match your interests and make your voice heard.
vote_on_topics.voting_step1: Browse debates or search for topics you care about
vote_on_topics.voting_step2: Read the debate description and see current results
vote_on_topics.voting_step3: Cast your vote: Yes, No, or It Depends
vote_on_topics.voting_step4: Share your reasoning in the comments section
vote_on_topics.voting_step5: See how your vote compares to the global community
vote_on_topics.benefit1_desc: Your votes are private. No one can see how you voted unless you choose to comment.
vote_on_topics.benefit2_desc: See actual statistics from real people, not bots or fake accounts.
vote_on_topics.benefit3_desc: Read comments from people across different countries, cultures, and backgrounds.
vote_on_topics.benefit4_desc: You can change your vote at any time as you learn more from the discussion.
vote_on_topics.cta_desc: Join our global community and make your opinion count.

public_opinion_polls.title: Public Opinion Polls Platform - Real-Time Survey Results | TheBatee
public_opinion_polls.meta_description: Create and participate in public opinion polls. Get real-time survey results on any topic. Free polling platform with instant analytics and global reach.
public_opinion_polls.subtitle: Measure what the world really thinks with real-time polls
public_opinion_polls.intro: TheBatee is your go-to platform for creating and participating in public opinion polls. Whether you're a researcher, content creator, student, or just curious about what people think, our platform gives you the tools to gather genuine insights from a global audience.
public_opinion_polls.use_case1_desc: Engage your audience and create viral content based on poll results.
public_opinion_polls.use_case2_desc: Gather data for academic projects and research papers.
public_opinion_polls.use_case3_desc: Test market sentiment and validate product ideas with real users.
public_opinion_polls.use_case4_desc: Support your stories with public opinion data and statistics.
public_opinion_polls.feature1_desc: Create yes/no questions or multiple-choice polls with up to 10 options.
public_opinion_polls.feature2_desc: Watch responses come in live with instant statistical analysis.
public_opinion_polls.feature3_desc: Let participants explain their votes and discuss results.
public_opinion_polls.feature4_desc: Embed polls or share links on social media, blogs, and forums.
public_opinion_polls.feature5_desc: Create polls in 12 languages and reach a truly global audience.
public_opinion_polls.feature6_desc: Download poll results and use them in your reports or presentations.
public_opinion_polls.vs_traditional: Unlike traditional survey tools, TheBatee is built for public engagement. Your polls aren't hidden behind paywalls or registration requirements. Anyone can vote, and results are public by default, making your polls more discoverable and shareable.

debate_controversial.title: Debate Controversial Topics - Safe Discussion Space | TheBatee
debate_controversial.meta_description: Debate controversial topics in a respectful environment. Discuss AI ethics, politics, social issues, and more. Moderated platform for civil discourse.
debate_controversial.subtitle: Explore difficult questions in a respectful, moderated environment
debate_controversial.intro: Not all topics are easy to discuss. TheBatee provides a space where people can debate controversial subjects with respect and civility. Our moderation system ensures discussions stay constructive while allowing genuine disagreement and diverse perspectives.
debate_controversial.reason1_desc: Exposure to opposing viewpoints helps break echo chambers and build empathy.
debate_controversial.reason2_desc: Engaging with controversy strengthens your arguments or helps you reconsider positions.
debate_controversial.reason3_desc: See all sides of complex issues before forming your opinion.
debate_controversial.reason4_desc: Learn to disagree respectfully, a crucial skill in democratic societies.
debate_controversial.topic2: Universal Basic Income: Progress or problem?
debate_controversial.topic3: Social media: Net positive or negative for society?
debate_controversial.topic4: Climate change policies: Too much or not enough?
debate_controversial.topic5: Freedom of speech: Where should the line be drawn?
debate_controversial.topic6: Remote work: Future of employment or passing trend?
debate_controversial.safety1: Community-driven moderation system with karma points
debate_controversial.safety2: Report system for inappropriate content or harassment
debate_controversial.safety3: Clear community guidelines against personal attacks
debate_controversial.safety4: Ability to block users who consistently violate guidelines
debate_controversial.safety5: Automated filters for hate speech and extreme content
debate_controversial.guideline3: Acknowledge valid points from opposing views
debate_controversial.guideline4: Stay on topic and avoid derailing discussions
debate_controversial.guideline5: Respect cultural differences and diverse backgrounds

online_voting.title: Online Voting Platform - Free Democratic Decision Making | TheBatee
online_voting.meta_description: Free online voting platform for communities, groups, and public debates. Transparent democratic decision-making with real-time results and discussion features.
online_voting.subtitle: Democratic decision-making for communities, groups, and the public
online_voting.intro: TheBatee is more than a debate platform—it's a complete online voting system designed for transparency, engagement, and democratic participation. Whether you're making decisions for a community, gathering team input, or measuring public sentiment, our platform makes voting simple and accessible.
online_voting.community1_desc: Let your Discord, Reddit, or forum community vote on decisions that affect them.
online_voting.community2_desc: Run club elections, budget votes, and event planning polls.
online_voting.community3_desc: Gather input on neighborhood initiatives and local projects.
online_voting.community4_desc: Make collaborative decisions across time zones and locations.
online_voting.feature1_desc: One account, one vote. Our system prevents duplicate voting and manipulation.
online_voting.feature2_desc: All votes are public and auditable. See exact results in real-time.
online_voting.feature3_desc: Voters can explain their choices and debate with others.
online_voting.feature4_desc: Vote from any device—desktop, tablet, or smartphone.
online_voting.feature5_desc: Web-based platform requires no downloads or software installation.
online_voting.feature6_desc: Create unlimited votes and polls at no cost.
online_voting.how_different_title: How Is This Different from Other Voting Tools?
online_voting.difference1: Public by default: Results are visible to everyone, promoting transparency
online_voting.difference2: Built-in discussion: Votes aren't just numbers, they come with reasoning
online_voting.difference3: Social discovery: Votes can go viral and reach beyond your initial audience
online_voting.difference4: Global reach: Available in 12 languages with international user base
online_voting.use_case1: Community decision-making on projects or initiatives
online_voting.use_case3: Team polling for remote work schedules or policies
online_voting.use_case4: Public opinion measurement on local or national issues
online_voting.use_case5: Content creator audience engagement and input
